Game Text:	Besieger. Tracker. The site number of each [Sauron] Orc is -3. Response: If Morgul Patrol wins a skirmish, exert it to make it fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Exert Morgul Patrol to wound a character it is skirmishing. Regroup: Exert Morgul Patrol to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions, where X is the number of burdens you can spot.
Rarity:	D
Notes:	League Card for LOTRO. No phyiscal card exists.
